name: a fickle light #11
description:
"Much outdoor lighting used at night is inefficient, overly bright, poorly targeted, improperly shielded, and, in many cases, completely unnecessary". [IDSA]
New Zealand regulations guiding streetlights are starting to reference the International Dark Sky Association in relation to light spill. The national organisation Waka Kotahi state that "we don’t have the sole goal of providing dark skies."

From a series - a fickle light - that focuses on artificial light and its effect on urban fauna and flora.
